dmca.title: [Fwd: FW: [Ticket#2007042410000265] DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for ritebuys.c
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2007 8:36 AM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: FW: [Fwd: FW: [Ticket#2007042410000265] DMCA Complaint from LG
Electronics for ritebuys.com]

 

ThePlanet.com,

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.  I have PDF the three
remaining infringing URL's, circling the text/description violations in
red.  If you should need any further information, please contact me via
email.

 

Copyright violations (text)

http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=52253&section=

http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=58157&section=

http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=68309&section=

 

 

Thank you,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 

compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Legal Response Team
[mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2007 5:13 PM
To: Barbara Davis
Subject: [Fwd: FW: [Ticket#2007042410000265] DMCA Complaint from LG
Electronics for ritebuys.com]

 

We are unable to locate on the web page

http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=52252&section= any of the

material that you claim is being infringed as of 04:12 PM --500 (Central

Daylight Time), Wednesday, May 02  2007 .

 

--

The Planet-EV1 Legal Response Team

https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal

(214)782-7800 :: 1-800-377-6103

Fax:: (214) 782-7756

 

 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

*From:* Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]

*Sent:* Thursday, April 26, 2007 9:23 AM

*To:* Response, Legal

*Subject:* FW: [Ticket#2007042410000265] DMCA Complaint from LG

Electronics for ritebuys.com

 

 

 

ThePlanet,

 

 

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.  I have rechecked

www.ritebuys.com <http://www.ritebuys.com/> and found they are still in

violation of LG's text.  I have pasted the infringing URL below to

better assist in reaching compliance.  Please notify me at

Bdavis@netenforcers.com <mailto:Bdavis@netenforcers.com> once your

client has removed all infringing material.

 

 

 

*Text*

 

http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=52252&section

<http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=52252&section>=

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you,

 

 

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----

From: Compliance Management
[mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com]

Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2007 6:08 AM

To: Barbara Davis

Subject: Re: [Ticket#2007042410000265] DMCA Complaint from LG

Electronics for ritebuys.com

 

 

 

 

 

Your Ticket-Team

 

 

 

 -

 

 Barbara Davis

 

 

 

--

 

 Super Support - Waterford Business Park

 

 5201 Blue Lagoon Drive - 8th Floor & 9th Floor - Miami, 33126 USA

 

 Email: hot@example.com - Web: http://www.example.com/

 

--

 

---- Forwarded message from legal-response@theplanet.com ---

 

 

 

From: legal-response@theplanet.com

 

To: compliance.management@netenforcers.com, copyright@theplanet.com

 

Subject: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for ritebuys.com

 

Date: 2007-04-24 07:30:02

 

 

 

> To Whom It May Concern:

 

> 

 

> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your

 

> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

 

> 

 

> Legal Response Team

 

> The Planet

 

> 

 

> 

 

> 

 

> ---------

 

> 

 

> 

 

> Please see the attached PDF.

 

> 

 

---- End forwarded message ---
